'''''Draksjukan. Mytiska fantasier hos Tolkien, Wagner och de Vries''''' ("Dragons-sickness: Mythical Fantasies of Tolkien, Wagner and de Vries") is a Swedish-language study of texts by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], [[Richard Wagner]] and [[wikipedia:Jan de Vries|Jan de Vries]], focusing on their use of similar mythological elements.
